title: @Riot could you tell me what i got from my most recent mystery gift?
body: It didn't tell me what i got

replies.body:
It seems there were some ghost notifications for mystery gifts as a result of the anniversary event. You'll get another notification for the actual content you get for the event.

You can find our official announcement [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you). Let me know if you have any questions.
